name: Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride

indications.text: diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection effective adults pediatric patients , premature infants neonates , following conditions oral form impractical :

contraindications.text: product intravenous intramuscular . diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection indicated oral form impractical . individualized according needs response patient .

warningsAndPrecautions: diphenhydramine hydrochloride injection , usp 50 mg/ml overbagged 5 x 1 ml vials bag , ndc 55154-5102-5 warning : unit dose package child resistant intended institutional . keep drugs reach children .
indications_original: Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection is effective in adults and pediatric patients, other than premature infants and neonates, for the following conditions when the oral form is impractical:
contraindications_original:
THIS PRODUCT IS FOR INTRAVENOUS OR INTRAMUSCULAR ADMINISTRATION ONLY.
                  Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection is indicated when the oral form is impractical.
                  DOSAGE SHOULD BE INDIVIDUALIZED ACCORDING TO THE NEEDS AND THE RESPONSE OF THE PATIENT.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride Injection, USP 50 mg/mL
                  Overbagged with 5 x 1 mL vials in each bag, NDC 55154-5102-5
                  WARNING: This Unit Dose package is not child resistant and is Intended for Institutional Use Only. Keep this and all drugs out of the reach of children.
